title: Project Yukki - Visual Novel Engine based Blockchain

common.lock: Lock it so that it cannot be edited.
common.unlock: Unlock it so that it can be edited.
common.up: Move the scroll position up slightly.
common.upToLine: Moves the scroll position to the top.
common.down: Move the scroll position down slightly.
common.downToLine: Moves the scroll position to the bottom.

IF.label: If
IF.tooltip: When this condition is met, the scene moves to that block.

ELSE_IF.label: Else If
ELSE_IF.tooltip: If this condition, not the parent condition, is met, the scene moves to that block.

ELSE.label: Else
ELSE.tooltip: If the parent condition is not met, the scene moves to that block.

WAIT.label: Wait
WAIT.tooltip: Pauses the scene by a set value.

COMMENT.label: Comment
COMMENT.tooltip: Write comments. Those comments are not visible in the scene.

errorMessage.TOKEN_NOT_FOUND: Token not found. Please sign-in again.
errorMessage.tooManyRequest: Too many requests, please try again later.
errorMessage.serverError:
An error occurred on the server.
Please try again later.
